name: n8n-nodes-base.typeformTrigger
description: Starts the workflow on a Typeform form submission

properties.name: formId
properties.description: Form which should trigger workflow on submission. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: simplifyAnswers
properties.description: Whether to convert the answers to a key:value pair ("FIELD_TITLE":"USER_ANSER") to be easily processable

properties.name: onlyAnswers
properties.description: Whether to return only the answers of the form and not any of the other data
